settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
Use collapsible tabs for more detailed information that will help customers make a purchasing decision.

Ex: Shipping and return policies, size guides, and other common questions.

settings.subtitle: Warm & Cozy
settings.title: Heat-trapping fabrics
settings.text: ActionHeat works hard to keep your feet warm and to comfortably enjoy your favorite outdoor winter activities longer than ever before.Â

settings.subtitle: turn on & warm up
settings.title: Be ready for any situation
settings.text: Built-In heating panels strategically placed on the foot use advanced ultra-fine fibers to provide superior heating performance.

settings.subtitle: PATENTED
settings.title: Ghost Mode Button
settings.text: You can now keep your heat on while turning off the LED light on your touch-button controller. This is a great option for hunters or people who just like to stay warm and hidden.

settings.subtitle: 5V, 3.7V, & AA Battery
settings.title: The perfect socks for you
settings.text: ActionHeat offers the best battery heated socks on the market and are the perfect blend of durability, quality and comfort.

settings.title: Lasts For Hours
settings.text: Whether you have a AA, 3V, or 5V item, our batteries are built to last. You will get hours of long-lasting heat.

settings.title: Tested Tough
settings.text: With the highest UL ratings and rigerous safety testing, ActionHeat is built to last and perform at the highest level.

settings.title: Weather Resistant
settings.text: Using top quality materials, our gear is safe to use in all weather. Rain or shine, our gear stands up to the elements.

settings.subtitle: Safe & powerful
settings.title: Slim Batteries
settings.text: The most versatile batteries on the market using the best materials on the market. Whether it's 3V, 5V, or 7V, we've got you covered!

settings.subtitle: Patented
settings.title: Ghost Mode Button
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to tell a story, explain a detail about your product, or describe a new promotion.

settings.title: Long Lasting
settings.text: Whether you have a AA, 3V, or 5V item, our batteries are built to last. You will get hours of long-lasting heat.

settings.testimonial: You can feel the heat in seconds after you turn them on. The battery is also small enough where you can barely tell it's there. Excellent product!
settings.author: Mike Z.

settings.testimonial: Used to get bad frost bite for years. But ever since finding these socks, I finally have relief. I am so thankful for ActionHeat socks.
settings.author: Carl W.

settings.testimonial: These are the best socks on the market, bar none. I wear mine so I can ski all day long. And my feet are SO HAPPY. No more frozen toes.
settings.author: Stephanie P.

settings.title: Don't take our word for it
